amendment.description: To prohibit payments to corporations that have delinquent federal tax liabilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3880 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3880 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5901; text: CR S5901) To prohibit payments to corporations that have delinquent federal tax liabilities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3880 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3880 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
